definition: to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of

sentences.english: What do alignment and harmonization really mean?
sentences.chinese: 校准和协调真正意味着什么？

sentences.english: Any aneroid gauge must be calibrated frequently.
sentences.chinese: 任何一种非液压表均必须经常校准。

sentences.english: SIMCO Scientific Instrument Repair and Calibration Services Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 西高科学仪器维修校准服务有限公司。

sentences.english: Set the calibrator to a new setting and produce a swaged assembly.
sentences.chinese: 在校准器上设置新的目标数据，进行扣压总成。

sentences.english: Thisimage has not been validated or calibrated.
sentences.chinese: 此图还并未被确认和校准。

sentences.english: The pre-pressure water shock tube dynamic calibration method is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了预压水激波管动态校准方法。

sentences.english: And this system raises the automaticity of vibration transducer calibration.
sentences.chinese: 提高了振动传感器校准的自动化程度。

sentences.english: That includes aligning the ring gauge before measuring for dia.
sentences.chinese: 那包括在测量直径之前排校准环规。

sentences.english: Verify that housing alignment dowels are in position before installing housing.
sentences.chinese: 安装壳体前先验证壳体校准销均已定位。

sentences.english: One-circle calibration method is adopted to realize auto-calibration.
sentences.chinese: 采用一周标定法实现电子罗盘的自动校准。

sentences.english: May install, maintain and calibrate industrial instrumentation and related devices.
sentences.chinese: 亦可安装，维护和校准工业仪器仪表及相关设备。

sentences.english: The calibration of heavy current tester for low voltage electrical apparatus was studyed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了低压电器大电流试验装置的校准。

sentences.english: The calibration result of pyranometers with an improved integrating sphere was presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道了总日射表用积分球校准的结果。

sentences.english: It is suggested and of common sense to do the calibration in Automatic injection mode.
sentences.chinese: 它将默认采用自动进样模式进行校准。

sentences.english: And I could have calibrated those words differently.
sentences.chinese: 我想用不同的词语来校准一下。

sentences.english: Auto Head Alignment after Changing Cartridge, A.
sentences.chinese: 更换墨盒后自动校准机头。

definition: to proofread and correct/to edit and rectify/to correct/to calibrate
to stake out (the boundaries of a property etc)/to demarcate/(engineering etc) to calibrate
to adjust to the right value/to tune/to focus (a camera etc)/to set (the date, the time) to the correct value
a test/determination/to check up on/to examine/to assay
